name: Pixel Ninja Maine Coon #12
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Common Maine Coon ninja with Shuriken skills.

backstory.name: Claw Hunter
backstory.origin: From the frozen northern shards of the blockchain, this Maine Coon ninja grew to be one of the most formidable digital warriors. Revered for impressive size and a thick coat that shields against even the harshest network conditions.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of the Grand Masters, Claw Hunter spent years mastering the Fire techniques, achieving the rank of Legendary after passing the Trial of Defense.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Legendary ninja, Claw Hunter specializes in the Defense stance while wielding a Shuriken, channeling the power of Fire to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Multi-Chain Attack - Can simultaneously target multiple networks with deadly accuracy
Burn Trace - Leaves no transaction history behind, perfect for covert operations
Firewall Fortress - Creates an impenetrable defense against external threats
